# <a name="how-do-i-turn-off-skype-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="f56f4-102">如何關閉 Skype 在 Outlook.com 中？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f56f4-102">How do I turn off Skype in Outlook.com?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f56f4-103">您無法移除 Outlook.com、 Skype，但您可以停用通知：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f56f4-103">You can't remove Skype from Outlook.com, but you can disable notifications:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="f56f4-104">開啟</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f56f4-104">Open</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f56f4-105">**設定** > **一般** > **[通知](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f56f4-105">**Settings** > **General** > **[Notifications](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/general/notifications)**.</span></span> 
2. <span data-ttu-id="f56f4-106">在 [**聊天和通話**] 停用不想再通知類型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f56f4-106">Under **Chat and call**, disable the notification types you no longer want.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f56f4-107">如需有關使用 Skype 的詳細資訊，請閱讀[洽詢系列和朋友用 skype 在 Outlook.com 中](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f56f4-107">For more information on using Skype, read [Talk to family and friends on Skype in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/83c6a5b1-3921-479c-b9e9-e753ce59c1fa?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
